price: 85. Tokkel Nabii Muusâ mari:Nabii Muusak nanu dibuk Yallal kelitneeh kibal kaal haysitnek Ni Rabbow daalimiinih yan maray koroositeh iisa nek keenih maacin, diinil nee mokkoraanamak iyyen.
arabic: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faqālū ʿalā al-lahi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
